message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.IR, cs.SY, cs.CY 

The paper discusses the automation of security assurance in IoT/IIoT systems through threat modelling, security analysis, and penetration testing. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also mentions the need for metadata in IoT/IIoT models, which could be relevant to information retrieval (cs.IR) and control systems (cs.SY). Additionally, the paper discusses the interconnection of physical machines and cyber space, which could be relevant to cybernetics (cs.CY).
